esema donamor madiliye amathidurayak yali athhada balanna barida.mehidi karaka sabhawata wiwidha kshethrawala nipunayanda athulath kara owungeda dayakathwaya ganimata puluwana.esema amathidurayada awurudu hatharak ho pahak lesa yam simawak hadunwa diya yuthuya.dewannata wagakim puhunuwada swayankriyawa labe.kabinat kramaya athiwimata pera thibune widhayaka karaka sabha kramayaki.mehidi amathiwaraya karaka sabhawe pradhaniya wiya.amathidhurayakata pathwime awasthawa wadi denekuta labe.amathiwaru wyawasthadayakaye samajikayan wiya yuthu natha.mewita siyaluma manthriwarunta amathikam dimata wattakka puhul amathikam nirmanaya kirime awashyathawaya nathiwe.

lowa wishalathama mantha lensuwa ha wogalaya nirmanaya karamin ginas warthawak pihituwimata mahanuwara dharmaraja widyalayiya baladaksha samuhaya samathwi atha.mantha lensuwa ha wogalaya baladaksha nila andume ek angayak wana athara dharmaraja bala dakshayan nirmanaya kala mantha lensuwa digin mitara 53.1kda palalin mitara 37.1k da weyi.ee sandaha waya kara thibena redi pramanaya mitara 960 ki.wewal upayogi kara ganimin nirmitha wogalaya mitarayak usaya.mahanuwara dharmaraja widyalayiya bala daksha samuhaye shatha sanwathsaraya nimiththen pawathwu risgo 2013 jathyanthara bala daksha ekamuthuwe kriyakarakam atharathura dina 06k thula bala dakshayan 20kage sahabhagithwayen me mantha lensuwa ha wogalaya nirimanaya kara thibe.me kriyakarakama ginas warthawak bawa ginas karyalaya mangin piligena pasugiyada eeta adala sahathikaya pirinamu athara merata pasalak wisin ginas warthawak pihita wu prathama awasthawa meyayi.dharmaraja widyalayiya aadi bala daksha sangamaye purna aashirwadaya madhyaye widuhalpathi es.

wissayi 20 loka kusalana tharagamalawe sathkaraka kodew pila kadulu 6kin parajayata path kala ostreliyanu pila awasan purwa wataya sandaha sudusukam laba gaththe ya.shri lanka kandayama indiya pilata erehiwa jaya wartha kirima nisa awasan purwa watayata piwisimata nam lakunu 22 ka paratharayakin oostreliyanu pila paradawimata kodewwanta siduwi thibini.namuth palamuwa panduwata paharadun kodew pila lakunu 105 k wani adu lakunu sankhyawakata dawi yame hethuwen awasan purwa watayata piwisimata kodewwanta thibu ilakkaya duras wannata patan gath athara oostreliyanuwan itha pahasu jayak athkara gaththe ya.kodew inime wadima lakunu sankhyawa wartha karanu labuwe ramharesh sarwanya.

daruwan nositiyada ohu sathu wu manushiya dayawa, karunawen hebi hadawatha nirathuruwama snehayen piri pawathuni. 1969 di ethumange siyalu katayuthu sandaha pasupasin siti paranawithana mathiniya miya yayi.paranawithana mahatha wishrama ganimen anathuruwada pura widya katayuthu pilibandawa soya baliya.1972 okthomibar masa 04 weni dina senarath paranawithana nami shreshta widwathanange abhawaya sidu wiya.
